About the Company: Indian Sucrose Ltd`s principal activity is to manufacture and exports White Crystal Sugar and its allied by product like Mollases, Bagasse, Alcohol and other Chemicals extracted from Sugar, also Manures, Breweries, Distilleries.The company also manufactures all kinds of Preserved food, Sauces, Jams, Alcoholic and Non Alcoholic Drinks and Pharmaceuticals, Sugar Cane, Sugar Beet and other Agricultural Products.
